scenarios.name: Verstappen Tire Offset Strategy - Controlled Burn

context.description: Started P6 due to 5-place grid penalty. Teammate Pérez pitted Lap 13. Verstappen extending stint for tire offset strategy.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's understanding of tire offset strategy vs immediate undercut. Superior pace allows controlled stint extension.

golden_truth.rationale: Softs at 14 laps still viable. Extending creates tire offset vs Pérez. Superior pace allows controlled burn strategy. Will pit soon but maximizing stint length.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Stayed out, pitted later, emerged behind Pérez, took lead on Lap 17

scenarios.name: Norris Rain Gamble - Soft Tire All-In

context.description: Started poorly, fell to P16. Light rain beginning. Most teams preparing for Intermediates. McLaren considering all-or-nothing SOFT gamble.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's risk assessment in uncertain weather. Contrarian strategy vs field. Commitment to 27-lap soft stint.

golden_truth.rationale: Light rain forecast to pass quickly. Track will dry. Soft tires allow recovery drive. Contrarian strategy vs Intermediate rush. High risk, high reward from P16.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Pitted for Softs, nursed them 27 laps to finish, recovered to P7

scenarios.name: Russell One-Stop Commitment - Track Position Priority

context.description: Only driver in top 10 attempting one-stop. Mediums at 22 laps, high wear. Rain shower passed. Track position vs fresh tires decision.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's track position valuation vs tire degradation. One-stop vs two-stop strategic commitment at Spa.

golden_truth.rationale: Mediums at 22 laps near critical degradation. One-stop requires final stint on Softs. 12.5s gap to P7 provides safe pit window. Commit to strategy.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Pitted for Softs, defended position on one-stop strategy

scenarios.name: Leclerc Overcut Counter - Drying Track Exploitation

weather.description: Rapidly drying after shower, improving grip

context.description: Hamilton pitted Lap 22 to undercut. Track drying rapidly. Leclerc staying out 2 extra laps on Mediums to execute overcut.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's dynamic track condition awareness. Overcut strategy on improving surface. Timing vs Hamilton undercut.

golden_truth.rationale: Track rapidly drying favors staying out. Mediums at 11 laps optimal. Setting personal bests as grip improves. Overcut Hamilton's undercut by 2 laps.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Stayed out, set personal bests, emerged ahead of Hamilton, secured P3

scenarios.name: Hamilton Free Pit Stop - Fastest Lap Opportunism

context.description: P4 secured with large gaps. 2 laps remaining. Opportunity for free pit stop to attack fastest lap point with fresh tires.
context.strategic_significance: Tests AI's opportunistic decision making. Free pit stop exploitation. Risk-free fastest lap attempt.

golden_truth.rationale: Massive gaps front and rear. P4 secured. Free pit stop with 2 laps remaining. Fresh Mediums for fastest lap point attempt. Zero strategic risk.
golden_truth.actual_outcome: Pitted for Mediums, set fastest lap 1:47.305, claimed extra point
